title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Phone Call with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
October 10, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke today with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom to address ways to deny Iran all paths to a nuclear weapon. President Trump underscored the need to work together to hold the Iranian regime accountable for its malign and destabilizing activities, especially its sponsorship of terrorism and its development of threatening missiles. Mattis and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff General Joseph Dunford.  The briefing and discussion focused on a range of options to respond to any form of North Korean aggression or, if necessary, to prevent North Korea from threatening the United States and its allies with nuclear weapons.
